summary: Implements a highâ€‘level SMB/CIFS client that negotiates protocol dialects, authenticates (NTLM/Kerberos), manages sessions and provides methods to list shares, enumerate directories, read/write files, manipulate directories, and interact with named pipes on remote hosts.
